የብቃት ምዘና ፈተና ለመውሰድ በመጠባበቅ ላይ ለምትገኙ ጤና ባለሙያዎች በሙሉ
__

የብቃት ምዘና ፈተና ለመውሰድ በመጠባበቅ ላይ ለምትገኙ ጤና ባለሙያዎች ምዝገባው በዚህ ሳምንት መጨረሻ የሚጀመር መሆኑን እያሳወቅን፤ ትምህርት ሚኒስቴር የሚሰጠውን የመውጫ ፈተና አልፋችሁ የተመረቃችሁ ተመዛኞች ምዝገባውን ለማከናወን የሚያስፈልጉ ቅድመ ሁኔታዎችን (ቴምፖራሪ ዲግሪ፣ መታወቂያ፣ 4*3 ፎቶ) ከወዲሁ አዘጋጅታችሁ እንድትጠባበቁ እናሳውቃለን፡፡

ማሳሰቢያ፡
ቴምፖራሪ ዲግሪ ያልያዘ ተመዛኝ ምዝገባውን ማከናወን የማይችል መሆኑን በጥብቅ እናሳስባለን፡፡
Via: MOH

📌 Vacancy Announcements:-


Organization: Action Against Hunger

Location: Vary

Positions:- 

1. Position: Research Program Manager

Education: Master’s degree in a major health science field of study, preferably public health, nursing, or nutrition, epidemiology Or a bachelor’s degree in a major health science field of study, preferably in public health, nursing, or nutrition; with relevant skills and experience
(well experienced)

Required No: 1


2. Positions (2): Senior Environmental Health Officer

Education: MSC or B.Sc. degree in #Environmental_Health, Water Supply Management, Hydraulic Engineering, Water Resource Engineering and any other related field; with relevant skills and experience
(3 years - 5 years minimum experience)

Required No: 2 


Deadline: Vary

🔗 Vacancies Details 
https://doctorsonlinee.com/tag/action-against-hunger/

Advertisement

📣 Exciting Training Opportunities for All Healthcare Professionals! - 6th round:-
(30% discount)

TenaFirst Plus with collaboration of Addis Ababa University College of Health Science.

👨‍⚕️ Instructor: Professor Mengistu Kifle (PHD in Telemedicine)

👥 Whether you're a doctor, nurse, pharmacist, lab technician, radiologist, nutritionist, or any other healthcare professional, this training is tailor-made just for you!

ℹ️ TenaFirst Plus is proud to present a unique opportunity to gain essential digital health skills and become an integral part of the digital health ecosystem, shaping the future of healthcare services.

🧑‍🏫 We’re offering an exclusive Online Digital Health and Telemedicine Training course for healthcare professionals, with certification upon successful completion.

💡Training Details:-

💡 Topic: Digital Health and Telemedicine Training

📃 Certification: Yes, awarded upon completion +  8 CPD points  (provided by Addis Ababa University College of Health Science, AAU)

🗓 Start Date: July 23, 2025

🕖Time: From 6:30 – 8:30 PM (Evening Time ) 

🌐 Format: Online (Limited spots available)

This 6th round training is designed to equip you with the vital skills that will significantly impact digital healthcare delivery and patient care. Whether you’re a doctor, psychiatrist, pharmacist, midwife, nurse, or any other healthcare professional, this program is perfect for enhancing your digital healthcare expertise.

Ready to advance your career? 

1,450 Birr 999.99 Birr only, hurry!! 

📝 Register now on:-
https://digitalhealth.et/

For further information:-

📱 Join our Telegram channel for details:-
https://t.me/tenafirstorg 

🤙 Call us via:- 0903050005, 0116685858

Chat with Experts -  Online  


➡️ Share

#DigitalHealth #Health #Healthcare #Telemedicine #DigitalHealthTraining #eHealth  #TeleHealth  #TenaFirstPlus #TenaFirstApp #AAU
